title.narrative: Expanding Business to Pasta & Macaroni Factory

description.narrative:
Uta Wayu is one of the succesful union on overall organizational development. In 2017 the union capital has increased from 55 million Birr to 76.9 million birr; membership has increased from 54,313 to 63,507 small holder farmers. The union is located in a potential area of producing malt barley, Haricot bean, Maize and wheat. In 2017 the union has purchased, 5,400 quintal haricot beans( 4,000 quintal exported through oromia federation), 39,100 quintal malt barley and 3,700 quintal of wheat. on mid of 2017 the union inagurated wheat Flour factory inorder to crush wheat and sold to surrounding areas. so far the production of wheat flour going well and on 2018 demands more to Brand and cover wide areas by producing quality flour, wants to increase volume of sales and distribute the profit to members. in 2017 the union sold 11,940 quintal of Wheat Flour and gain ETB 12,322,080. after hiring Marketing manager the union is succesful on marketing activities and have a plan on 2018 to purchase 60,000 quintal of Malt barley, 151,400 quintal of Wheat for the factory, 10,000 quintal of Haricot bean( 5,000 will be exported direcly by the union), Maize 10,000 quintal. Uta wayu is a graduated/ advanced client of Agriterra for 2018 and will focus only on selected advisory service topics.
For 2018 the union will focus on branding the wheat flour and increase volume of sales by producing quality product and also focus on to have Feseability study for expansion in Pasta and Macaroni factory. the wheat is strong and more preferred for Pasta & Macaroni rather for bread. The AP will focuses on Marketing & Branding activities and strengthening decision makers to have broader insight for models of Financing. The Factory has a capacity of crushing 600 quintal per day if they works 24 hour with three shifts but currently the machine works only 130 quintal per day with one shift. As the nature of Wheat on the area is hard they want to visit some unions or private companies that have pasta and Macaroni Factory to grasp their experience and best practice. afterwards they will decide to conduct feasibility study for expansion of Pasta and Macaroni Business. The 2018 main activities are: increase the benefit of farmers by engaging the union in to additional business venture i.e pasta and macaroni factory,conducting feasibility study for pasta and macaroni factory having well organized marketing strategy for wheat flour factory and for the planned new business,enabling for utilizing the maximum capacity of the installed machine for quality production and increase volume of sales
Increase the benefit of farmers by creating additional business.
